website_summaries.verdict: A simple, classic design to blend with almost any style.
pros: Sturdy enough to take every day use as a writing or computer desk
cons: Occasionally arrives without some of the necessary hardware

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Luv this piece of furniture. We are using it for a desk in my dad's room so he can have a place to prepare paper work and pay bills. He is absolutely satisfied with the price and workmanship. It's worth every penny! Great product Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I really like this table.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality table. If your in the market for good quality little table, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: SiscoKid

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute desk and so easy to put together, I did it myself in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Easily holds a 32” television
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this table for another use but found that it was the ideal height and size ( 29 h x 44 w x 16 d) to hold a 32 inch tv. The table has a simple easy to dust Shaker design that blends into any decor. This Winsome Wood one drawer table was very easy to assemble and I found no flaws in the finish. This is such a versatile and unobtrusive table that I am considering buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Bichon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a computer desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a computer desk. It has more than enough room for my 24" lcd, large keyboard, mouse and speakers. It was very easy to assemble (only had to attach the legs to the top and screw in the drawer's knob) and is a very solid piece of furniture with a beautiful finish. If you live in a small apartment like me and want a stylish computer desk that is comfortable to work on but doesn't take up much space, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.H.

customer_reviews.title: great little table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these tables. They're quality made and very nice looking, much better than what you'd expect for the price. They make a nice little computer desk or writing desk, or even just as an accent table. The drawer is small, basically just a pencil drawer, but I don't use it anyway. One of the tables I got had a scratch on the top, which was frustrating because it appeared to have happened before the table was even packed in the box. I was able to touch up the scratch, so it wasn't a big deal, and certainly not worth doing a return. The second table was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Madigan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all-purpose table for my small space.
customer_reviews.text: Because my space is small, I needed one table to use for eating, sewing, and writing. This table is perfect! I just got it today but I love it already. It was so easy to put together, it is very sturdy, and the fit and finish is really beautiful. I can’t believe how inexpensive it was! I received one extra bolt, washer and other hardware which was appreciated. Like other reviewers I did not install the peg as a drawer stop, but I don’t see it being a problem as I don’t think I would ever pull it out so far that it would fall. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CJColorado

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Console!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking console table. It arrived in perfect condition, thanks to the professional packing. I am completely satisfied and would recommend this console to anyone. My expectations were not very high based on the price Boy, was I surprised. It is solid, well constructed and looks much more expensive that it is. I am a big fan of Shaker furniture and this fits right in with my other items. It is easy to assemble and takes just a few minutes. Although, there is a small 2" dowel that somehow should be installed behind the drawer. I cannot figure out how to install it. The drawer still pulls out and goes in smoothly. An enigma!
customer_reviews.author: BeethovenBuff

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table. I use this as a computer table in the corner of my living room. It is a good-looking table and made of real wood, not the cheap particle pressed board. It tool me about 20 minutes to unpack and assemble. The only reason I subtracted a star from the rating is that one of the threaded holes in one of the legs was about 3/8" of an inch off. I wasn't able to get the screw to thread in that hole. I put that leg on the back in order to minimize the risk of bumping in to it.
customer_reviews.author: McCarsonJR

customer_reviews.title: Bolts do not secure to legs
customer_reviews.text: Item is affordable. Looked nice after it arrived. It is easy to build. That said, many of the bolts did not fight tightly into the legs. I was able to secure two legs. However, the bolts spun freely in the other legs and in fact would pop out causing the legs to fall off the table, rendering the table useless. After trying various combinations of different bolts and legs to see if I could get something to fit, I gave up, and processed a return.
customer_reviews.author: Eleven

customer_reviews.title: Temporary work desk
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this side table to act as a temporary home office desk while I wait for a back ordered desk from another furniture store. This table allows me to use my home office while working from home under COVID-19 lockdown/remote work requirements. Once my larger desk arrives I'll repurpose this table to another location in my home. The assembly was easy not overly confusing and not time consuming. The only flaw or issue I have is the wood finish on the desk drawer was not consistent (see pictures). One side of the drawer wood finish is nice however the other side is completely the opposite (e.g. rough, not stained, cracked).
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic45

customer_reviews.title: but everything was perfect -- packaging was done well and everything you need ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, high quality solid wood, polished, and finely detailed for $60?! I was worry that it might arrive with damaged parts as others have stated, but everything was perfect -- packaging was done well and everything you need to put it together is all included. I needed a simplistic small desk that is long enough to hold two monitors and yet able to fit into a 44" corner space. After extensive search I initially ordered the Tribesign workstation desk, however, it never shipped from a company called A to Z on Amazon. Now I'm glad because this is perfect! I'm gonna order another.
customer_reviews.author: Derick B

customer_reviews.title: Great table at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that a table at such a low price point could be a quality item; however, I was wrong. This is a great console table, nice and sturdy, and its assembly couldn't be simpler. I had it put together, put in place, and decorated in less than 10 minutes. The table's appearance is classic with clean lines and a nice finish, so I imagine it would coordinate well with a variety of styles. The conversation area in which I'm using this table features a combination of Oriental and casual traditional furnishings and this table is the perfect compliment!
customer_reviews.author: LizzzieD

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a small desk
customer_reviews.text: Like others here I am using this table as a desk in a guest room. I was happy with the way it looks, it fits perfectly in the available space, it was easy to put together. Local stores sell something of similar size and quality for 3 or 4 times as much. Thanks to all the prior reviewers who pointed out this could be used as a desk, I saved a lot of money and headache shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect computer desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer desk. It looks beautiful, as nice as a desk I paid three times more for. It is more narrow than a full size desk but provides enough room for my guests to use a laptop, have a lamp and spread out papers or files. The drawer opens and closes easily and stays in place without the hardware that more expensive desks have. My guest room is fairly small, so one side is up close to the bed and it doubles at a nightstand and functions well for that too. My 12 year old grandson put it together, he had no complaints so I believe the assembly went smooth.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this desk as I only paid $50 for it. It is actually quite heavy and much more sturdy than I expected. It is the perfect size to fit in my living room nook as I did want something small to just accommodate a laptop. The assembly was very easy as you just have to attach the legs and the knob for the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: djnm

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! As a teacher, I have homework almost every evening but I hate shutting myself away to get it done. This table looks great in our living room and is the perfect size for me to do my grading while keeping my husband company while he reads or watches TV. When I'm not using it, it makes the perfect side table. Love it, love it, love it! Why did I wait so long to get this for myself?
customer_reviews.author: AIS

customer_reviews.title: Why is this not higher on the search list for desks?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: After one returned desk, four more composite made desks placed in cart and later removed and five pages deep into the desk search I finally found a solid wood desk for an amazing price! This desk is beautiful and made of real wood. The only composite board is on the sides and back of the small drawer. It took ten minutes to assemble (just attach the legs and drawer knob) and is very sturdy. I ordered two and placed them back to back for a dual laptop area. (: THIS TABLE SHOULD BE MUCH HIGHER ON THE SEARCH FOR DESKS :)
customer_reviews.author: tripleMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We just had new floors put in which makes everything else look off, including our old desk (typical Walmart pressed wood with laminate wood image glued on) This desk is lovely. It’s solid wood and will last a lot longer, and it has a great finish. I only wish the drawer was larger. But our problem with the old desk is it gave too much room to store junk to toss out “later”, this forces us to stick to essentials. I added another to my cart for next month. Plan to use second as entry table in our hall. Will work for keys, mail, vase, etc. Hope the price sticks for my wait. It’s well worth $68.
customer_reviews.author: inky

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table for the price and matches other pieces in the family perfectly. (Some are called Winsome Wood, some Grain Wood Furniture. Evidently different importers are selling this style under their various names.) I've also bought the six-drawer tall dresser and the nightstand, plus the "Shaker panel" platform bed. They look lovely together and I'm quite pleased with all of them. PS: The drawer is rather small inside -- fine for pens, pencils, notepads and similar small objects, but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Cute Make-shift desk
customer_reviews.text: I used this to set up a desk space for my daughter who is attending college virtually. The table is large enough to hold her MAC book, IPad and a few books. For the money, it is not a bad piece of furniture; I find the wood to be quite sturdy and solid. The drawer could be improved upon, as it is not a dovetailed joint. But for this price, i did not expect one. When everything returns to normal and I get my living room back, I will use it as a console table.
customer_reviews.author: scb~

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further! Beautiful & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I researched for a couple of weeks looking for a cherry wood table to put in my foyer. This table was reasonably priced and appeared well made. I purchased and waited. Two days later the table came and with in 15 minutes, I had put it together without my husbands assistance! The piece is gorgeous! Looks and feels like expensive quality furniture. I'm impressed and everyone that comes over always compliments it. You won't be disappointed 😉
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my desk!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an entryway table/make-shift desk. It’s a gorgeous color, but did get a tiny nik in the legs during shipping/assembly (you can’t see it tho since it’s on the back). It’s really the perfect height/depth for me to work on since I don’t need a ton of space for just my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: BearsBeetsBattlestarGalactica

customer_reviews.title: Quite a nice table all around
customer_reviews.text: Quite a nice table all around. I have a standing desk at my office and spend most of the working day on my feet. I find myself sitting on occasion to eat lunch, drink tea, read a book, surf the internet on a laptop, etc. Also, I frequently have visitors at my office area and like to offer them a place to sit. This table is an excellent solution for all of those things. It has a slim profile so I have it tucked away in a corner. The table arrived in pristine condition and took around 15 minutes to unbox and assemble. I highly recommend this table especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: BMV

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Beautiful Furniture Addition
customer_reviews.text: You will never beat the value or pricing for this beautiful table. It has the appearance of a much more expensive table. The finish is flawless, color perfect and readily matches mahogany or antique cherry furniture. This table can be used in a variety of ways from a sofa table, writing table or laptop desk. It is versatile, extremely sturdy and visually pleasing. It assembles easily in under ten minutes. It is packed well for shipping, and easy to open and remove from packaging. I highly recommend this table for it's value, sturdiness and physical appeal.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I chose this table for its narrow width for a "not so large bedroom" table for jewelry boxes, etc. The table was packaged strongly and arrived without a scratch. It was very easy for me to assemble. I left it in the box with the top down, discarded the packing material, and found the necessary hardware and tool package. Then I assembled the legs; set the table upright; inserted the dowel for the drawer (no assembly necessary as drawer is already assembled). It is just right for a narrow space below my bedroom window. The finish on this table is good to great. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: THawk

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actual solid wood!!! Color me shocked. Including unpacking and easy assembly, it took 30 minutes with no effort by myself. One person can move it. Very stable and study. The legs fit tight and have zero wobble. The finish is a medium fruitwood color. I needed an elongated computer/writing desk with a drawer for a guest bedroom that isn't very large. It is perfect for the space and function. And the price is exceptional for the quality. Would work well as a sofa table or entry piece if you're on a budget or space limited. Being of solid wood and sturdy, I imagine it would easily hold 100 pounds if needed. This one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: lalo

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood - works perfectly as a desk!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. Have bought several different items over the past 4-5 years and have never been disappointed. It was super easy to assemble and looks very nice. Although it's packaged pretty well our table still had a small dent on the top surface - no paint scratch so we're just leaving it as is. (We did purchase a different Winsome desk a while back where the hutch was completely broken and Winsome sent over a brand new hutch with no issues.) Overall, it's a solid table that can easily be used as a desk (as seen from all of the review photos). Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen F.

customer_reviews.title: Can I give more than 5 stars?!
customer_reviews.text: Box was light enough to carry upstairs on my own. When first opening it, it has the strongest wood smell. I hadn’t even realized it wasn’t particle board when I ordered it but the underside definitely seems to be solid wood(which smells AMAZING). It was as easy as attaching the four legs and was done assembling it in 15 minutes. It’s pretty short, which I wanted but just be aware. Overall, I’m surprised it didn’t cost more.
customer_reviews.author: kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived on time and the package was very neat and secure. I was able to assemble the table fairly quickly without any complications. I have to say that this table went way beyond my expectations! I found the craftsmanship to be impeccable for the price point. The legs and table top itself and drawer front are indeed solid wood. It is a very beautifully stained espresso color and is very rich looking. I would highly recommend purchasing this table, you will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: No one believes me when I tell them where I got this table or how much I paid. It is solid as a rock and has such an elegant, timeless design. I use mine as a console table in my entry way so I only have a lamp and some accessories on it. The little drawer is great for holding my grocery list and some pens. It is the perfect size and the finish is stunning. You can't go wrong with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot, exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: it came really fast, and it was really easy and self explanatory to assemble. But it fits perfectly in the room I wanted it to be in, it's not to big or bulky, serves its purpose well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice small writing desk
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this console table as a small writing desk in a guest bedroom. My room is large, but this desk's narrow depth would make it perfect for a small room, too. There is enough surface space for a laptop, books, a small lamp, etc., and good "knee" room underneath. It's got a small drawer as well. The desk is a beautiful color and a solid piece of furniture. Giving it four stars because the allen wrench included with the assembly packet was too short. We ended up using a longer allen wrench included in the Winsome Wood End Table.
customer_reviews.author: bsw

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. I use it as the primary desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I use it as the primary desk in my office. I liked it so much, I bought a second one for my assistant. I didn't pay enough attention the first time, and it was smaller (less deep) than I thought, but it turned out to be perfect. (The desk surface is 16" x 44".) Well-made. Easy to put together. Took about 15 mins. from opening the box to using the desk. The only tool needed is the allen wrench that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a temporary desk while I save for a more expensive one, but I am shocked at the quality of this comparatively cheap desk! It's awesome, and I'm going to get much more use out of it than expected. It looks like it would have cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks table/desk- just right!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a desk in the guest bedroom but there was not enough room for a regular desk, so we bought this little table and a chair to match and it works beautifully to put a laptop on and be decorative at the same time. It doesn’t take up too much space. It’s just the right size. It’s very sturdy and upscale looking, even though the price was better than anything else I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but very strong chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: This table is very nice and a good size for my application. However, it has a very strong chemical odor. I specifically order this brand because two other tables I purchased from Winsome did not have any odor at all. Strong chemical odors are frequently a problem with these types of tables. Disappointed. I will leave the table outside in a covered area for a few weeks to see if the small dissipates.
customer_reviews.author: GKL2000

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I got this console to use as a desk for my laptop. It is beautiful wood and very sturdy with a handy drawer. Very easy to put together, did by myself. Just the right size, perfect for my needs. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Medicsr

customer_reviews.title: Total no-brainer...
customer_reviews.text: Total no-brainer. Solid wood, perfect fit and finish (just as pictured), easy peasy assembly (10 mins, with only a phillips screwdriver required), and a ridiculously low price. I've bought several other products produced and sold from Malaysia, and all have been substantial pieces that require assembly, but offer incredible value. I put this piece in my new office, and it blends well with my other espresso finish furniture. Looked at over a 100 other tables on Amazon, Target, and Overstock, and this one was the pick of the litter.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for many uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to replace an old desk. I wanted something big enough for my laptop and printer, but not too big to fit in my small space. It's narrow, which I love. Good thing is, if I ever decide not to use it as a desk, it is pretty enough to be used against the wall as a display table. I'm not that easy to please sometimes, so I am pleasantly surprised at how much I like this :)
customer_reviews.author: Aline Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Great wood desk
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Winsome products - this is my fourth purchase from them. I like real wood items and most or their products are just that. This is a solid, nice looking desk that we are using for remote schooling. I did have a minor issue on the screw hole of one leg, but their Customer Service was awesome and they sent a replacement part right away.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Real wood from Malaysia!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the table to be partially laminated but that was not the case! Is is real wood, made in Malaysia. The construction was a breeze, I recommend getting one of those bicycle 3 hex tool, since the hex's head is size 4, to speed it up. All you have to do is put together the legs. None of that crazy IKEA assembly stuff where you have to spend hours assembly all the parts. This is a steal. I might get another one.
customer_reviews.author: TheCabinCoder

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Good quality, simple assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is made from hardwoods. I can see raw mahogany and I think all major parts are mahogany too. I timed it. It took just over 10 minutes to build. This will last decades. Nice simple design.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent du St. Germaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice classy little desk for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my small space. Easily fits my laptop, monitor, keyboard, mouse, desk lamp, power strip, and a pen holder, but is slim enough to not take up too much space in our room. The desk was easy to put together in just a few minutes and feels sturdy. The only piece that's not as secure is the drawer... but it's a small drawer and not meant to hold anything really heavy. Overall I love it. It looks super classy and is the perfect workspace for me :)
customer_reviews.author: B&E

customer_reviews.title: extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: table is sturdy and easy to assemble. the design and size make this table very versatile. using it as a small desk temporarily and can see myself using it as a hallway entry table or a writing table later on. extremely happy to find a table made of real wood in the same price range as those made from wood chip. couldn't be happier to have found this little table.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: A challenge to put together, but worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.text: A challenge to put this together - got two legs on easily, but then could not screw the other two on because the angle of the hole was wrong in relation to the screw. After 2+ hours, gave up and processed a return request. Then because we liked the color and finish of the wood, decided to switch all the legs around, and finally were able to get all four screwed on properly. It is a very nice looking table for the money -- a lot nicer wood finish that you would expect
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Literally took 10min to assemble, feels very sturdy and is a perfect desk for my office/art room! I couldnt be happier I was looking at a number of desks and was considering one of those folding tables but they where so expensive I just decided to spend the extra $30 and get something nicer and I'm so glad I did it also looks easy to disassemble if I move.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solid wood - writing desk
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome solid wood writing desk. Looks very good and assembly is a breeze. Sturdy and heavy. Please be aware that the width of the desk is a little small by design. If you have already taken the measurement - then it should not surprise you. Overall a very good deal for a sturdy writing table.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Balan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Asked For
customer_reviews.text: Great wall table/desk. Sleek and sturdy. Looks expensive. Easy to put together. Get a lot of compliments. Be careful with what you place on it, i.e. use a coaster to avoid water stains. Don't use it as a desk without protecting the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and solid
customer_reviews.text: This table lives up to all the praise received in prior reviews. It’s solid, sturdy and beautiful. I was looking for a piece to complete our foyer. Due to COVID, shopping at stores is out. This table Is very reasonably priced, arrived on time, and was very easy to assemble. I swapped out the knob for one that matches our home finishes. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Witt III

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered right away and the pieces were packed well. The table is very simple to put together, quality in the craftsmanship, sturdy and the wood is heavy. I highly recommend this item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MIKO

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: Very little assembly is needed. You basically just need to attach the legs and drawer knob. Extra parts were included just in case and everything lined up fine. For the price, the quality of this table was unexpected. It does not wobble at all and the design is sleek and can blend into any decor. There’s a console that looks similar to this by Pottery Barn and that costs around $300. I’m very happy with this purchase. For those wondering, the markings indicate that the table was made in Malaysia.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: but for the price this is a great deal. It's being used as a computer table
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality table than I anticipated. It's solid wood, except for the drawer. Which is the only aspect I can nitpick, but for the price this is a great deal. It's being used as a computer table. We have a Mac Mini desktop and it's footprint is small enough that we can mount it underneath the table to hide it and reclaim as much tabletop space as possible. We're very happy with the table and overall surprised at the cherry finish. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazor

customer_reviews.title: Solid, we'll constructed and finished table.
customer_reviews.text: I was I was skeptical to buy a piece of furniture on Amazon, but due to do good price and many positive reviews I decided to give this a chance as if it my needs perfectly. I assembled the table today (super simple!). It looks just as pictured. It's solid and well constructed, no blemishes or missing parts. We purchased to be used as a study desk for a narrow space. It'll be perfect. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and more sturdy than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and more sturdy than I expected. Makes a great side table. For what it's worth...The drawer is so small, it's pretty worthless, but I didn't but it for the storage, so I wouldn't have used it anyway. Don't expect a useable drawer if you're buying this. It can fit keys, but that's about it
customer_reviews.author: Travis A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Area computer desk
customer_reviews.text: I've actually bought 3 of these for computer desks. One holds double monitors and a small PC, keyboard, mouse, etc. The other holds a 27" monitor, laptop, desk lamp, etc. The third holds an All in one computer. We didn't not want large computer desks so these worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Irapcola

customer_reviews.title: For the price this desk is hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: We needed a second, smaller desk for our shared home office and this one has fit the bill perfectly. I normally dread putting together boxed furniture but this one was pretty straight-forward and easy. It feels sturdy, doesn't take up a lot of space and best of all: it looks really nice. The single drawer is slightly small and doesn't feel like it'll last forever but we'll see, with gentle use it should be fine. So far, my wife has really enjoyed her new desk. Bottom line: easy to assemble and much better quality than you'd expect at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jc444

customer_reviews.title: Bad Drawer
customer_reviews.text: I paid $57 for this product and I got what I paid for, a three star table. The walnut is really nice and the table construction design is good. The drawer is total junk and that's why the three stars. Don't plan on putting much in it or using it very often because it will fall apart eventually if you use it to much.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small desk and I purchased this one for its price and color. I was really surprised at just how nice the quality was! It is solid wood, heavy, and very sturdy. The draw works well too. This isn't just a temperary solution kind of desk. I expect I will be using this for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little table
customer_reviews.text: This is really perfect for a small space and desk. Since I’m WFH I needed something for my computer for work. Luckily this fits a large monitor, keyboard, and I still have room for a notepad. Super easy to assemble, pretty sure it took me less than 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Jade H.

customer_reviews.title: NICE DESK, EASY ASSEMBLY, BUT VERY SOFT WOOD
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table and it is easy to put together, but the wood is soft and dings easily. After putting it together, we put a pretty light knick-knack on it and it left a ding mark. Also, there was an extra drill hole underneath that almost goes through to the other side of the wood which is the top of the desk. Other than that, it's a pretty good desk.
customer_reviews.author: Malibu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Writers/ Laptop Desk
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Writers Table. Arrived fast, new in box, undamaged and intact. Easy to assemble, just put on the legs and that's it. I was afraid ordering this desk because the photos made it look small, but it's larger than I thought. It is perfect for a desk or laptop desk. Taller than I imagined. Beautiful color, very strong solid wood, not cheap partical board. Great desk at a great price. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece
customer_reviews.text: This table was much sturdier than I expected! I was able to put this together by myself quickly and its slim design made it a perfect fit near the closet door in my bedroom. I could not get the little dowel piece in on the inside of the drawer, but because there is a stopper underneath, I wasn't worried. Great piece at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: tvesi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small desk
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this to be this nice. I read the reviews and people raved about it, but I was still skeptical. It was not very expensive, so I thought it would be low quality, but I was wrong. It is all wood and heavy. The assembly was really easy, I put it together myself in 5 minutes. Legs are solid and the table does not wobble at all. Overall, I am very pleased and it exceeded my expectations. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It lives up to the high rating
customer_reviews.text: Real wood, easy to assemble. It's sturdy and looks great. The drawer seems to be particle board, but the legs and top are solid wood. On installation, there is a little wooden peg that is supposed to work as a drawer stop. Well that peg makes it impossible to get the drawer in. Don't bother with the peg. Can't beat the price for a quality table like that.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Torgerud

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is great table. I've had it for a few months now. It arrived undamaged and was super easy to put together. Just don't tighten down everything till all the legs are are on. Then don't gorilla grip everything so tight. That will make wood split. For those complaining the handle was on the inside of the drawer, thats to protect it during shipping. Just unsrew it and put it on the outside. I was impressed with the quality of this table, especially for the price. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small table or desk
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small desk for my son's room. Enough of an area to do homework. This is perfect. Super easy to assemble and doesn't take up a large area in his room. My other son wants one now and I may get a 3rd one for a TV stand. Very versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Blockhead77

customer_reviews.title: great tv table.
customer_reviews.text: son got a new tv. old one was pedestal mount,ok for older tv stand. new tv has 2 wider spaced legs and could not fit on 26 inch wide stand. old stand is 24 inches high. fits easily under new table. Other son wants the same setup and so do I. probably 2 of these in near future. Table is easy to assemble,took more time to get off the floor than to put together.Looks really good! old stand holds game systems ,drawer holds controllers.
customer_reviews.author: mariane spenser

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I don't give out too many 5 star ratings, but this one deserves it. First off, it's a sturdy piece of furniture. Not flimsy like you might expect for the price. Next, it took less than 5 minutes to put together. Why isn't all furniture that requires assembly this easy? Seriously, all I had to do was screw the legs on and the knob for the drawer. I feel cheated by all the other pieces of furniture I've put together over the years. The misaligned holes and ridiculous instructions that never make sense...no more! And lastly, it smells nice. I'm so happy with this purchase and quite honestly, I would have paid close to double the price.
customer_reviews.author: JulieD5671

customer_reviews.title: Perfect writing/computer desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table. I'm using it as a computer desk in a room with limited space and it is absolutely perfect. It's not suuuper sturdy (it wobbles a bit with some weight), so probably not the best for lots of leaning or heavy items, but it definitely holds up to writing and typing, as well as the occasional drawing or coloring. It arrived packaged well and in perfect condition. The legs attached just fine with the provided hardware and I also received a few extra piece of hardware which are nice to have. Overall, I'm super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cute and priced right
customer_reviews.text: We bought this initially for staging our house when we were selling it. We were surprised at the level of quality given how inexpensive it is. We now have it in a small guest room, where it serves as the perfect guest desk, make-up table, etc. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AlisonA

customer_reviews.title: Doubtful about quality of the material as the one I got had a piece broken
customer_reviews.text: It looks much similar to the pictures here, thats good. But it has a small hole under the table(For the one I got). It is not visible in the regular use, hence I didn't return this product considering its a big piece to return. Usage wise it is ok so far, but I'm worried about the quality of the material used, and the way it came to me in this broken condition. Attaching the pic with view upside down!!
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, except for the drawer
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. I use it as a desk for a small space. Arrived in perfect condition. Easy to assemble. Came with all necessary hardware and a tool to put it together. Stable. All solid wood...except for the drawer, which is my only complaint. The drawer is very small and heavy, made mostly of particle board. The runners are just channels cut in the particle board, so the drawer doesn't open smoothly. If you are planning to use the drawer every day, you might want to think about installing some actual runners on the sides. Other than that, the price was very good for a table of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Used for faux fireplace surround
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a faux fireplace surround. It works great! I even used the box it came in (covered with black cloth) to elevate it a bit to look more like a mantel top. With a piece of black fabric on it, it gives the impression of a fireplace for a lot less than real fireplace surrounds. If I ever decide not to use it for that purpose, it will make a lovely entry table. I placed an electric log fire (no heat) under it and a lace cloth (like a mantel scarf) over it, and presto! A fireplace! Lots of compliments on it too. Looks very cozy. Plenty of surface space for decorative items on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Merica Saint John

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and beautiful. I bought it to use as a small desk but it ended up in my living room entrance to display pictures. Probably the easiest piece of furniture i have ever put together. Definitely worth the money for a solid wood table!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mulhearn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect side table for my dining room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to cover a space with a small divider in my dining room and it works great. Going to use it as a secondary desk or can also be used as a small buffet area when entertaining. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Easley

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for the price. The drawer edge sticks out (not flush with front surface), but that's the way it's supposed to be. The wood color is nice and the style is attractive. Good against a wall or behind a couch. This has real wood, and not fiberboard.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heff

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Table - would be 5-stars except for came with "ding" on the viewable surface
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Table - would be 5-stars except for came with "ding" on the viewable surface! The table is solid, with a very sound design. The screws sometimes took a little extra work to get them to fit correctly and line up, but with a little "tactical patience" this was not a show stopper. Great Value! The price to have it shipped to my door was unbeatable. Even with the minor ding on the table top, I would buy it again in a heartbeat for my apartment as a wall table and laptop desk. I would post pictures but my MacBook is not cooperating.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and in good shape. It's a great piece of furniture for the money and matches my other furniture to a tee. I take off a star though because the pilot holes on the desk bottom didn't align properly with the holes on the legs. This made assembly very difficult and time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: texjohn

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong. Solid Wood. Much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected a cheep, particle board, poorly made, piece of furniture. What I received is a solid wood, heavy, well made, sturdy piece of furniture. You can't go wrong for the price. It should last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Marrotte

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: The second one I ordered came with scratch on the top that had been stained and finished from the manufacturer. So I figured I would cover it with a doily and started to assemble it when I found out two of the legs had stripped threads installed... so disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: jimmyk

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little table for my office. Was easy to install legs and carry. Fits exactly where I wanted it. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mountainmama2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Holes were too big on one of the legs, the screws went straight in the hole without having to be screwed in. I called their support number and it gave me loud fax machine noises. I placed a missing item request through their website, well see if I get a call or an email back. Update- A received a new leg for the table today! 👌 awesome customer service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Owen Smith

customer_reviews.title: The main reason I bought this product is because it ...
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this product is because it comes with a drawer. The drawer arrived broken. I reached out to the vendor requesting another drawer via e-mail but it bounced back. How do we get another drawer? Please call and text me at 404-455-2728
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Couch table
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious ordering furniture online, however was overly satisfied with the quality & sturdiness of this table. The packaging was superior. It went together well, no missing parts. It now graces the wall behind the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S

customer_reviews.title: perfet table
customer_reviews.text: Table was exactly what I was looking for to fit a particular space. Have bought 2 of them. HAD A SMALL PROBLEM WITH ONE OF THE TABLES AND THE SELLER RESPONDED TO ME RIGHT AWAY AND TOOK CARE OF ISSUE.
customer_reviews.author: FRED CAUDILL

customer_reviews.title: Great desk/console table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of sitting @ my kitchen table working from home, COVID-19 reality. Was able to find this piece that fit in with my existing pieces. Was super easy to put together, had it done in like 5 minutes. Now I have a great desk, that I use daily. But if needed can be used as a console as well. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: D. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has the exact same table she is using as a computer desk. Solid wood, great quality for the price. I bought this table to match hers they are both against the same wall with a dresser drawer sitting between the two tables. They look great and work well as computer or writing desk. It was very easy to assemble (only had to attach the legs to the top and screw in the drawer's knob) and is a very solid piece of furniture with a beautiful finish. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: onekajun

customer_reviews.title: Nice, slim and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a computer table for my small-ish NYC bedroom. I thought it was impossible to find a nice and affordable table with a depth of 20" or under, until I came across this Winsome unit. Looks exactly as pictured. I'm sure the wood isn't that great, but it seems pretty sturdy and nice. Very to assemble and came with all the required tools. Took me about 10 minutes to screw in the four legs and drawer. Again, if you're looking for something slim and doesn't take up much space, this is probably it. I would've liked the drawer to be wider, but no biggie. Now I just need a nice and affordable office chair :)
customer_reviews.author: Linh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with this table...right out of the box I knew I was going to LOVE it!!! I was able to take the legs out and put the whole table together in less than 10 minutes. The quality....where does one even begin...for $58 I think is what it was but looks like it could be well over $200 its beautiful! If you even have a question about getting...question no further and GET THIS ONE! Arrived so quick and worth EVER penny! I just wish I had gotten a few years ago when I was thinking about it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Willey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of furniture for small rooms!
customer_reviews.text: After searching in several stores and seeing low ended quality at high prices, we figured we had nothing to lose in trying this. Fabulous win! Sturdy, nice quality, small enough for the bedroom but big enough to work on. Went together super fast and we are VERY pleased with this purchase! 💖
customer_reviews.author: cipa1923

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this table five stars. It looks amazing and was simple to put together (under 10 min). Unfortunately, it came with a sizeable chunk missing from the top of the table, right where everyone can see. I don't care enough to return it, but I know the table is packed in the box very securely. This happened before it left the factory, so bad quality control is the likely culprit. Don't have the time/energy to return it so I'll cover it up, but this simple blemish turned an otherwise amazing buy into something marginal.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to assemble. Looks much more expensive than it is. Two screws in each leg with allen wrench that was provided. Screw knob on to drawer. Done! Beautiful finish. What could be used as a sofa table or entryway or writing desk.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It's a great table.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to serve as a desk in my office. The first one was great. The second one arrive with a broken drawer so it does not sit level. Contacting the seller was not profitable.
customer_reviews.author: Virgina Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to put together--just attach the four legs
customer_reviews.text: This console table was a steal. The price was unbelievably low for a piece of furniture made from real wood. It was so easy to put together--just attach the four legs, put the knob on the drawer and insert a peg in a predrilled hole to keep the drawer from pulling all the way out. And the finished project was beautiful. It was packaged well so there were no scratches or dings in the wood. Great little console table.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Morinello

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with scratches on the top surface, otherwise beautiful desk/table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful small desk/table, unfortunately came with a few scratches on the top surface. Didn't notice until I'd installed the legs and flipped it over. Checked the box, nothing to scratch it there, must have been prior to shipment. Easy to set up, used the provided hex wrench for the 8 leg bolts and a phillips for the drawer handle. There's some extra parts just in case you lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Boyd

customer_reviews.title: If I did it you can!
customer_reviews.text: Look - I get anxiety when I have to put anything together, but I read many reviews on this table and everyone said it was easy to assemble. Well, it is!!! Also, like other reviews, I was shocked at how sturdy it is. It does not look or feel cheap at all. So far I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Campbell C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT - BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I've purchased in a long time. It is beautiful! I put it in my living room in back of the sofa. The finish is really nice and the color is beautiful. It doesn't look cheap sitting in my living room. I waited a couple of days to assemble because I was AFRAID! Not to worry! Even a dope like me had it together in no time! You just screw in the legs with the little hexagon wrench-y thing that is included. The knob for the drawer needs a small screwdriver. Great deal. I'd order it again if I ever need one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. White

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Table is very good looking, we have 2 that we are using as computer tables in a small room. Relatively ease to assemble but took a while to tighten the 8 screws for the legs. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: engineer guy

customer_reviews.title: Arghhhhh but then yay!
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service turned out to be excellent! Received the hardware in 3 days. Put the table together (easy assembly) . It's a solid wood sturdy table. Looks fantastic! 1st review:Got this Monday, attempted to assemble what looks to be a really nice wooden table. No hardware included, not a bolt, screw or a washer. Not happy at the moment. No telephone number to call for missing parts. Just a fill out and mail in form. Then cross fingers and wait and hope and wait.... Will update review as I see how this plays out ...
customer_reviews.author: cyndia

product_meta.title: Winsome Wood Rochester Occasional Table, Antique Walnut
feature_bullets: Wood Console Table ; Color Finish: Antique Walnut
Drawer with pull for storage ; Material: Solid / Composite Wood ; Assembly Required: Yes
Traditional Styling compliments most decor ; Drawer provides storage and features brushed-nickel hardware
Antique walnut finish ; Sturdy square legs which taper downward
Sleek design ; Easy to assemble with parts and tools included

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
